trans-unit.source: Represents the simple binding between the property value of an object and the property value of a control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer enkle bindingen mellom egenskapsverdien for et objekt og egenskapsverdien for en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Use the Binding class to create and maintain a simple binding between the property of a control and either the property of an object, or the property of the current object in a list of objects.
trans-unit.target: Bruk klassen Binding til å opprette og opprettholde enkel binding mellom egenskapen til en kontroll og egenskapen for et objekt, eller egenskapen for det gjeldende objektet i en liste over objekter.

trans-unit.source: As an example of the first case, you can bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control to the `FirstName` property of a `Customer` object.
trans-unit.target: Som et eksempel på det første tilfellet, kan du binde den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>for en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>styre til den `FirstName` -egenskapen til en `Customer` objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: As an example of the second case, you can bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control to the `FirstName` property of a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> that contains customers.
trans-unit.target: Som et eksempel på det andre tilfellet, kan du binde den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>for en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>styre til den `FirstName` -egenskapen til en <xref:System.Data.DataTable>som inneholder kunder.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Binding class also enables you to format values for display through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> event and to retrieve formatted values through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> event.
trans-unit.target: Klassen bindingen også mulig å formatere verdier for visning via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>hendelsen og til å hente formaterte verdier via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>

trans-unit.source: When constructing a Binding instance with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.%23ctor%2A> constructor, you must specify three items: - The name of the control property to bind to.
trans-unit.target: Når en Binding-forekomst med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.%23ctor%2A>konstruktøren, må du angi tre elementer: – navnet på kontrollegenskapen skal bindes til.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The data source.
trans-unit.target: -Datakilde.

trans-unit.source: - The navigation path that resolves to a list or property in the data source.
trans-unit.target: -Navigasjon banen som løses til en liste eller en egenskap i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The navigation path is also used to create the object's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingMemberInfo%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Navigasjon banen brukes også til å opprette objektets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingMemberInfo%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingMemberInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: First, you must specify name of the control property you want to bind the data to.
trans-unit.target: Først må du angi navnet på kontrollegenskapen du ønsker å binde til data til.

trans-unit.source: For example, to display data in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control, specify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel for å vise data i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>styre, må du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Second, you can specify an instance of any one of the classes in the following table as the data source.
trans-unit.target: Sekundet, kan du angi en forekomst av en av klassene i tabellen nedenfor som datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Third, you must specify the navigation path, which can be an empty string (""), a single property name, or a period-delimited hierarchy of names.
trans-unit.target: Tredje, må du angi navigasjon-bane, og det kan være en tom streng (""), et enkelt egenskapsnavn eller et punktum delt hierarki med navn.

trans-unit.source: If you set the navigation path to an empty string, the <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> method will be called on the underlying data source object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter navigasjon banen til en tom streng i <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>metoder kan kalles for det underliggende datakildeobjektet.</xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, which can contain multiple <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> objects, the navigation path must be used to resolve to a specific column.
trans-unit.target: Hvis datakilden er en <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, som kan inneholde flere <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>objekter navigasjon-banen må brukes til å løse til en bestemt kolonne.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>, or <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, you are actually binding to a <xref:System.Data.DataView>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når datakilden er en <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>, eller <xref:System.Data.DataTable>du er myndig binding til en <xref:System.Data.DataView>.</xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, the bound rows are actually <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> objects.
trans-unit.target: Derfor bundne radene er egentlig <xref:System.Data.DataRowView>objekter.</xref:System.Data.DataRowView>

trans-unit.source: A period-delimited navigation path is required when the data source is set to an object that contains multiple <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects (such as a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> or <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>).
trans-unit.target: En delt perioden navigasjon-bane er obligatorisk når datakilden er satt til et objekt som inneholder flere <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objekter (som en <xref:System.Data.DataSet>eller <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>).</xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: You can also use a period-delimited navigation path when you bind to an object whose properties return references to other objects (such as a class with properties that return other class objects).
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke en bane for delt perioden navigasjon når du binder til et objekt med egenskaper returnere referanser til andre objekter (for eksempel en klasse med egenskaper som returnerer andre klasseobjekter).

trans-unit.source: For example, the following navigation paths all describe valid data fields: - "Size.Height" - "Suppliers.CompanyName" - "Regions.regionsToCustomers.CustomerFirstName" - "Regions.regionsToCustomers.customersToOrders.ordersToDetails.Quantity" Each member of the path can return either a property that resolves to a single value (such as an integer), or a list of values (such as an array of strings).
trans-unit.target: For eksempel følgende navigasjon baner alle beskrive gyldig datafelt: - "Size.Height" - "Suppliers.CompanyName" - "Regions.regionsToCustomers.CustomerFirstName" - "Regions.regionsToCustomers.customersToOrders.ordersToDetails.Quantity" hvert medlem i banen kan returnere en egenskap som løses til en enkelt verdi (for eksempel et heltall) eller en liste med verdier (for eksempel en matrise av strenger).

trans-unit.source: Although each member in the path can be a list or property, the final member must resolve to a property.
trans-unit.target: Selv om hvert medlem i banen kan være en liste eller en egenskap, må det siste medlemmet løses til en egenskap.

trans-unit.source: Each member builds on the previous member: "Size.Height" resolves to the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> property for the current <xref:System.Drawing.Size>; "Regions.regionsToCustomers.CustomerFirstName" resolves to the first name for the current customer, where the customer is one of the customers for the current region.
trans-unit.target: Bygger hvert medlem i det forrige medlemmet: "Size.Height" løser <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>-egenskapen for gjeldende <xref:System.Drawing.Size>; "Regions.regionsToCustomers.CustomerFirstName" løses til fornavnet for den gjeldende kunden der kunden er en kunder for gjeldende område.</xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> returns a list of values by linking one <xref:System.Data.DataTable> to a second <xref:System.Data.DataTable> in a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataRelation>Returnerer en liste over verdier ved å koble én <xref:System.Data.DataTable>til en annen <xref:System.Data.DataTable>i en <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataRelation> en

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> contains <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> objects, you can specify the data member as a <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> followed by a <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A>, and then a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Data.DataSet>inneholder <xref:System.Data.DataRelation>, kan du angi datamedlemmet som en <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>etterfulgt av en <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A>, og deretter en <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRelation> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> named "Suppliers" contains a <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> named "suppliers2products", the data member could be "Suppliers.suppliers2products.ProductName".
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis den <xref:System.Data.DataTable>navnet "Leverandører" inneholder en <xref:System.Data.DataRelation>med navnet "suppliers2products" datamedlemmet kan "Suppliers.suppliers2products.ProductName".</xref:System.Data.DataRelation> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The data source can consist of a set of related classes.
trans-unit.target: Datakilden kan bestå av et sett med relaterte klassene.

trans-unit.source: For example, imagine a set of classes that catalogs solar systems.
trans-unit.target: Tenk et sett med klasser som kataloger oppretting systemer.

trans-unit.source: The class named `System` contains a property named `Stars` that returns a collection of `Star` objects.
trans-unit.target: Klassen `System` inneholder en egenskap med navnet `Stars` som returnerer en samling av `Star` objekter.

trans-unit.source: Each `Star` object has `Name` and `Mass` properties, as well as a `Planets` property that returns a collection of `Planet` objects.
trans-unit.target: Hver `Star` objektet har `Name` og `Mass` egenskaper, i tillegg til en `Planets` -egenskap som returnerer en samling av `Planet` objekter.

trans-unit.source: In this system, each planet also has `Mass` and `Name` properties.
trans-unit.target: I dette systemet har også hver verden `Mass` og `Name` egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: Each `Planet` object further has a `Moons` property that returns a collection of `Moon` objects, each of which also has `Name` and `Mass` properties.
trans-unit.target: Hver `Planet` mer-objektet har en `Moons` -egenskap som returnerer en samling av `Moon` objekter, som også er `Name` og `Mass` egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: If you specify a `System` object as the data source, you can specify any of the following as the data member: - "Stars.Name" - "Stars.Mass" - "Stars.Planets.Name" - "Stars.Planets.Mass" - "Stars.Planets.Moons.Name" - "Stars.Planets.Moons.Mass" Controls that can be simple-bound feature a collection of Binding objects in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>, which you can access through the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir en `System` objekt som datakilde, kan du angi følgende som datamedlemmet: - "Stars.Name" - "Stars.Mass" - "Stars.Planets.Name" - "Stars.Planets.Mass" - "Stars.Planets.Moons.Name" - "Stars.Planets.Moons.Mass" Kontroller som kan være bundet til enkel funksjonen en samling av Binding objekter i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>, som du har tilgang til via kontrollens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>

trans-unit.source: You add a Binding to the collection by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A> method, thereby binding a property of the control to a property of an object (or to a property of the current object in a list).
trans-unit.target: Du legger til en Binding til samlingen ved å kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A>metoden, og dermed binding en egenskap for kontrollen til en egenskap for et objekt (eller en egenskap for gjeldende objekt i en liste).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can simple-bind to any object that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control?displayProperty=fullName> class, for example, the following Windows controls: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> > [!NOTE] > Only the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control is simple bound.
trans-unit.target: You can simple-bind to any object that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control?displayProperty=fullName> class, for example, the following Windows controls: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> > [!NOTE] > Only the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control is simple bound.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox></xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox></xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar></xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox></xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar></xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox></xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown></xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox></xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label></xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar></xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox></xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox></xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class is an abstract class that manages all the Binding objects for a particular data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>klassen er en abstrakt klasse som administrerer alle objektene bindingen for en bestemt datakilde og datamedlemmet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> are the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> classes.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som er avledet fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>er den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>klasser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: How a Binding is managed depends on whether the Binding is a list binding or a property binding.
trans-unit.target: Hvordan en Binding administreres, avhenger av om bindingen er en binding liste eller en Egenskapsbinding.

trans-unit.source: For example, if it is a list binding, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> to specify a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> in the list; the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A>, therefore, determines which item (out of all items in the list) is actually bound to a control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er en liste-binding, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>til å angi en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A>i listen; den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A>, bestemmer derfor som elementet (utenfor alle elementer i listen) faktisk er bundet til en kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: To return the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den riktige <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>ved å bruke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: To add a new row to a set of controls bound to the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.AddNew%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
trans-unit.target: Legge til en ny rad til et sett med kontroller som er bundet til samme <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A>ved å bruke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.AddNew%2A>metoden for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.AddNew%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> class to return the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>klassen for å returnere den riktige <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> egenskap</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: To escape the addition of the new row, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å Escape-kode i tillegg til ny rad, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> class that simple-binds the indicated control property to the specified data member of the data source.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"> </xref> klasse som enkel-bindinger angitte kontrollegenskapen til det angitte datamedlemmet for datakilden.

trans-unit.source: You can specify an instance of any of the following classes for the data source: - <xref:System.Data.DataSet> - <xref:System.Data.DataTable> - <xref:System.Data.DataView> - <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> - Any class that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface - Any class See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class for more information about creating the `dataMember` string.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi en forekomst av en av følgende klasser for datakilden:- <xref:System.Data.DataSet>- <xref:System.Data.DataTable>- <xref:System.Data.DataView>- <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>-klassen som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.IList>interface - noen klasse se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>klasse for mer informasjon om hvordan du oppretter den `dataMember` streng.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> </xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: When you create a binding to a control's property, the new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> inspects the events exposed by the bound control and attaches to two particular events: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName> - An event named *PropertyName*`Changed` (for example, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged?displayProperty=fullName>) If you attempt to bind to a property that does not exist, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> will be thrown when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> is added to the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en binding til en kontroll egenskapen den nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>inspiserer hendelsene eksponert i den bundne kontrollen og legger til to bestemte hendelser:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName>– en hendelse navnet *PropertyName* `Changed` (for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged?displayProperty=fullName>) Hvis du prøver å binde til en egenskap som ikke finnes en <xref:System.ArgumentException>vil bli utløst når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>legges til kontrollens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> </xref:System.ArgumentException> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>

trans-unit.source: The name of the control property to bind.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på kontrollegenskapen skal bindes.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer datakilden.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The property or list to bind to.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen eller listen skal bindes til.

trans-unit.source: propertyName is neither a valid property of a control nor an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: propertyNameverken en gyldig egenskap for en kontroll eller en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: The property given by propertyName does not exist on the control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen angitt av propertyName finnes ikke i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> class that binds the indicated control property to the specified data member of the data source, and optionally enables formatting to be applied.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.FormattingEnabled*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and a binding operation is complete, such as when data is pushed from the control to the data source or vice versa
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.FormattingEnabled*>er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> og en binding-operasjonen er fullført, for eksempel når data trykkes fra kontrollen til datakilden eller omvendt</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.FormattingEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised under any of the following conditions when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.FormattingEnabled%2A> is `true`: - Data from the data source is pushed onto the control property.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår under følgende betingelser når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.FormattingEnabled%2A>er `true`:-Data fra datakilden trykkes på kontrollegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.FormattingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Data from the control property is pushed onto the data source.
trans-unit.target: -Data fra kontrollegenskapen trykkes til datakilden.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised at the completion of these operations, independent of the completion status.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når disse operasjonene, uavhengig av fullføringsstatusen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a binding operation binds a null value to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value%2A> property, an exception is thrown, but the BindingComplete event still occurs.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en binding operasjon binding en nullverdi for eksempel en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value%2A>egenskapen et unntak, men BindingComplete hendelsen er løst.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The handler of this event can take the appropriate action, based on the success, error, or exceptions in the binding process, by examining the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs.BindingCompleteState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Et behandlingsprogram for denne hendelsen kan utføre de nødvendige handlingene, basert på var vellykket, feil eller unntak pågår bindingen ved å undersøke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs.BindingCompleteState%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs>parameteren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs.BindingCompleteState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> that manages this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> som behandler dette <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that contains information about this binding based on the dataMember parameter in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Henter et objekt som inneholder informasjon om denne bindingen basert på den dataMember parameter i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.%23ctor%2A> konstruktør.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo> is created from the `dataMember` string passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo>er opprettet fra den `dataMember` streng som er sendt til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo"></xref> that contains information about this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om denne <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control that the binding belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Henter kontrollen bindingen tilhører.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that the binding belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> som bindingen tilhører.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets when changes to the data source are propagated to the bound control property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir når endringene til datakilden er overført til egenskapen bundet kontroll.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlUpdateMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlUpdateMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlUpdateMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlUpdateMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source for this binding.
trans-unit.target: Henter datakilden for denne bindingen.

trans-unit.source: Possible data sources include: - A <xref:System.Data.DataSet> - A <xref:System.Data.DataTable> - A <xref:System.Data.DataView> - A <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> - Any object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface - Any object
trans-unit.target: Mulig datakilder: – en <xref:System.Data.DataSet>– en <xref:System.Data.DataTable>– en <xref:System.Data.DataView>-en <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>- eventuelle objekt som implementerer <xref:System.Collections.IList>grensesnittet - objekter</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer datakilden.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value to be stored in the data source if the control value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or empty.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien som lagres i datakilden hvis kontrollverdien <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> eller tom.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.NullValue%2A> property to specify the value displayed in a bound control when the data source contains <xref:System.DBNull>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.NullValue%2A>til å angi verdien som vises i en bundet kontroll når datakilden inneholder <xref:System.DBNull>.</xref:System.DBNull> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to be stored in the data source when the control property is empty or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>være lagret i datakilden når kontrollegenskapen er tom eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref> for value types and <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> for non-value types.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.DBNull"> </xref> for verdityper og <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> for ikke-verdityper.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates when changes to the bound control property are propagated to the data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir når endringer i egenskapen bundet kontroll er overført til datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Note that even if this property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode>, the binding will update at least one time, when it is first established.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at selv om denne egenskapen er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode>, bindingen oppdaterer minst én gang, når den først er opprettet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode>

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates when changes are propagated.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir når endringer overføres.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the property of a control is bound to a data value.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når egenskapen til en kontroll er bundet til en verdi.

trans-unit.source: The Format event is raised when data is pushed from the data source into the control.
trans-unit.target: Formatet denne hendelsen oppstår når data trykkes fra datakilden i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: You can handle the Format event to convert unformatted data from the data source into formatted data for display.
trans-unit.target: Du kan behandle Format-hendelsen for å konvertere formatert data fra datakilden til formaterte data for visning.

trans-unit.source: When data is pulled from the control into the data source, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> event is raised to unformat the displayed value, then the Format event occurs to reformat the data for display.
trans-unit.target: Når dataene er trukket ut av kontrollen i datakilden, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>hendelsen skjer hvis du vil unformat verdien som vises, og deretter Format inntreffer hvis du vil formatere dataene for visning.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the bound control displays correctly formatted data regardless of whether the user enters formatted or unformatted data in the control.
trans-unit.target: Dette sikrer at den bundne kontrollen viser riktig formatert data uansett om brukeren angir formaterte eller formatert i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The Format and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> events allow you to create custom formats for displaying data.
trans-unit.target: Formatet og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>hendelser gjør det mulig å opprette egendefinerte for visning av data.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the data in a table is of type <xref:System.Decimal>, you can display the data in the local currency format by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs> to the formatted value in the Format event.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis data i en tabell er av typen <xref:System.Decimal>, kan du vise dataene i det lokale valutaformatet ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs>formatert verdien i formatet-hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> </xref:System.Decimal>

trans-unit.source: You must consequently unformat the displayed value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> event.
trans-unit.target: Du må derfor unformat verdien som vises i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>

trans-unit.source: The Format event occurs whenever the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Current%2A> value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> changes, which includes: - The first time the property is bound.
trans-unit.target: Formatet hendelsen oppstår når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Current%2A>verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>endringer som inkluderer: – første gang egenskapen er bundet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Any time the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> changes.
trans-unit.target: -Når som helst av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A>endringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Whenever the data-bound list is sorted or filtered, which is accomplished when a <xref:System.Data.DataView> supplies the list.
trans-unit.target: -Når databundet listen er sortert eller filtrert, som utføres når en <xref:System.Data.DataView>leverer listen.</xref:System.Data.DataView>

trans-unit.source: The Format event also occurs after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> event.
trans-unit.target: Format-hendelsen oppstår også etter den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>

trans-unit.source: For example, when a control loses focus, its contents are parsed.
trans-unit.target: Når en kontroll mister fokus, analyseres for eksempel innholdet.

trans-unit.source: Immediately afterward, as new data is pushed into the control, the Format event occurs allowing the new contents to be formatted.
trans-unit.target: Umiddelbart etterpå som nye data trykkes i kontrollen, inntreffer i formatet slik at det nye innholdet formateres.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.IFormatProvider> that provides custom formatting behavior.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref:System.IFormatProvider>som gir egendefinert formatering virkemåte.</xref:System.IFormatProvider>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property will override the default formatting behavior, which uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property setting.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen overstyrer standard formatering virkemåte som bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapsinnstillingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation that provides custom formatting behavior.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IFormatProvider>implementering som gir egendefinert formatering virkemåte.</xref:System.IFormatProvider>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the format specifier characters that indicate how a value is to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir formatet spesifikator tegn som viser hvordan en verdi som skal vises.

trans-unit.source: The format string used should follow standard .NET Framework format specifications.
trans-unit.target: Formatstrengen som brukes bør følge standard spesifikasjoner for .NET Framework-format.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Formatting Types in the .NET Framework](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [formateringstyper i .NET Framework](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The string of format specifier characters that indicate how a value is to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Tegnstrengen format-IDen som viser hvordan en verdi som skal vises.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether type conversion and formatting is applied to the control property data.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om typekonvertering og formatering brukes til kontroll egenskapsdataene.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `true` also enables error-handling behavior and causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete> event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen settes `true` også aktiverer feilbehandling virkemåte, og gjør den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete>-hendelse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete>

trans-unit.source: The handler of this event can take the appropriate action, based on the success, error, or exceptions in the binding process, by examining the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs.BindingCompleteState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Et behandlingsprogram for denne hendelsen kan utføre de nødvendige handlingene, basert på var vellykket, feil eller unntak pågår bindingen ved å undersøke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs.BindingCompleteState%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs>parameteren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs.BindingCompleteState%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if type conversion and formatting of control property data is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis typekonvertering og formatering av kontrollen egenskapsdata er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the binding is active.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om bindingen er aktiv.

trans-unit.source: A binding is active when it meets these conditions: - All its properties are set.
trans-unit.target: En binding er aktiv når den oppfyller disse betingelsene: – alle egenskapene er angitt.

trans-unit.source: - The user did not call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.ResumeBinding%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.SuspendBinding%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> belongs to.
trans-unit.target: -Brukeren ikke kall <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.ResumeBinding%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.SuspendBinding%2A>på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>tilhører.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.SuspendBinding%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.ResumeBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The control to which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> belongs has been created.
trans-unit.target: -Kontrollen som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>tilhører har blitt opprettet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the binding is active; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis bindingen er aktiv. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Object> to be set as the control property when the data source contains a <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref:System.Object>angis som kontrollegenskapen når datakilden inneholder en <xref href="System.DBNull"> </xref> verdi.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The data source must contain <xref:System.DBNull> for the NullValue property to be correctly applied.
trans-unit.target: Datakilden må inneholde <xref:System.DBNull>for egenskapen NullValue som skal brukes på riktig måte.</xref:System.DBNull>

trans-unit.source: If the data source type is a type such as a string or integer the value of the NullValue property will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis datakildetypen er en type som en streng eller et heltall verdien for egenskapen NullValue vil bli ignorert.

trans-unit.source: Also, the NullValue property is ignored if it is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Også NullValue-egenskapen ignoreres hvis den er satt til `null`.

trans-unit.source: A null value will be added to the data source when the control property is set to the object of NullValue.
trans-unit.target: En nullverdi legges til datakilden kontrollegenskapen er satt til NullValue-objektet.

trans-unit.source: If NullValue is set to a string value, comparisons are case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: Hvis NullValue er satt til en strengverdi, er sammenligninger samlingstype.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to be set as the control property when the data source contains a <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>angis som kontrollegenskapen når datakilden inneholder en <xref href="System.DBNull"> </xref> verdi.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnBindingComplete method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnBindingComplete kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnFormat method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnFormat kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnParse method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnParse kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of a data-bound control changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for en databundet kontroll endres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> and Parse events allow you to create custom formats for displaying data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>og behandle hendelser gjør det mulig å opprette egendefinerte for visning av data.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the data in a table is of type <xref:System.Decimal>, you can display the data in the local currency format by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs> to the formatted value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> event.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis data i en tabell er av typen <xref:System.Decimal>, kan du vise dataene i det lokale valutaformatet ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs>formatert verdien i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> </xref:System.Decimal>

trans-unit.source: You must consequently unformat the displayed value in the Parse event.
trans-unit.target: Du må derfor unformat verdien som vises i hendelsen spaltes.

trans-unit.source: The Parse event occurs under the following conditions: - After the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> occurs.
trans-unit.target: Behandle inntreffer følgende betingelser: – etter den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>hendelse for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>forekommer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.EndCurrentEdit%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> is called.
trans-unit.target: -Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.EndCurrentEdit%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>kalles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.EndCurrentEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Current%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> changes (in other words, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> changes).
trans-unit.target: -Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Current%2A>av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>endringer (altså når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A>endringer).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the control's data-bound property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på kontrollens databundet egenskap.

trans-unit.source: Use the PropertyName to specify the control property that you want to bind to a list in a data source.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av PropertyName til å angi kontrollegenskapen som du ønsker å binde til en liste med en datakilde.

trans-unit.source: Most commonly, you bind a display property such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Mest brukte du binde en visning-egenskap som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>for en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, because you can bind any property of a control, you can programmatically create controls at run time using data from a database.
trans-unit.target: Fordi du kan binde en egenskap for en kontroll, kan du imidlertid programmatisk opprette kontroller ved kjøretid bruker data fra en database.

trans-unit.source: The name of a control property to bind to.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på en kontrollegenskap som skal bindes til.

trans-unit.source: Sets the control property to the value read from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Angir kontrollegenskapen til verdien som leses fra datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Reads the current value from the control property and writes it to the data source.
trans-unit.target: Leser den gjeldende verdien fra kontrollegenskapen og skriver den til datakilden.
